name: MEGA STICKY
description:
MEGA STICKY is a precision platformer focused on using your mega sticky frog tongue to swing through levels. It's dang hard, and there are 3 levels (...plus 1??) to swing through. GOOD LUCK.


CONTROLS:

Keyboard: A/S/Arrow Keys (START = Return)

Gamepad: Left Stick + XBOX A/B

P.S. there is a special ending if you can get all the coins :o :o :o
